description: Number of starting positions of Nim with 2n pieces such that 2nd player wins. Partitions of 2n such that xor-sum of partitions is 0.
references: R. J. Nowakowski, G. Renault, E. Lamoureux, S. Mellon and T. Miller, The Game of timber!, http://www.labri.fr/perso/grenault/NRLMM.pdf, 2013. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 11 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 15 1999
